items.title: ElectroSwing
items.content_html:
Imagine that Skrillex was transported back in time to a Prohibition-era speakeasy and landed the DJ job.

Yeah. It’s like that. Love this track.

music.apple.com/us/album/…
items.content_text: Imagine that Skrillex was transported back in time to a Prohibition-era speakeasy and landed the DJ job. Yeah. It’s like that. Love this track. [music.apple.com/us/album/...](https://music.apple.com/us/album/mist-you/1325205437?i=1325205623)

items.title: Virginia Norwood, ‘Mother’ of Satellite Imaging Systems, Dies at 96
items.content_html:
Ever used or just enjoyed looking at multispectral LANDSAT imagery? You have this woman to thank for it!

🌎 🛰️🌈

Paywall-free link: Virginia Norwood, ‘Mother’ of Satellite Imaging Systems, Dies at 96

Mastodon post
items.content_text:
Ever used or just enjoyed looking at multispectral LANDSAT imagery? You have this woman to thank for it!

items.title: Niblet the Beaver
items.content_html:
This is Niblet the Beaver from the SOMA chocolatemakers in Toronto. Niblet was absolutely delicious. Do check him out if you have the urge to eat a beaver.

www.somachocolate.com/collectio…
